no not out of space but being installing and trying alot of different apps and such then deleting, alot of updates etc i'm used to running a defrag every other week on widows but since i switched to lucid dont know how
i thought this at first as well.  ext file systems (others as well) don't fragment like Windows file systems do.
so they don't need to be defragmented - they clean up after themselves on the fly.
